agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 19, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. James B. Frank The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. *Testimony will be limited to three (3) minutes.* HB 25 González, Mary Relating to the provision of services to certain children under the Medicaid medical transportation program. HB 45 Minjarez | et al. Relating to creating a mentor program for foster youth. HB 123 White | et al. Relating to the issuance of personal identification documents for foster children, homeless children or youth, and unaccompanied youth. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
